preqs: ATS2902This unit is only available to students enrolled in a Bachelor of Music single or double degree.

rules.ruleString: Must have passed an (I/W) unit in {ATS2902}

description: Students will learn fundamental conducting techniques, including basic beat patterns. Students will be required to propose a program of works to be arranged and/or conducted for performance by an approved ensemble. Students will develop approaches to interpretation, and refine baton techniques specific to their program choice.
